attributes.action: reinstate compulsory foreign language learning at key stage 4 (GCSE) in all English secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reverse the decision to make foreign languages a non-compulsory option at GCSE level in all English secondary schools.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
